p: All mouse and ferret immunization and challenge experiments were approved by the local committees and were conducted in accordance with national guidelines for the care and use of laboratory animals (Landesamt f체r Gesundheit und Soziales (Berlin, Germany) approval G0255/16, Regierungspr채sidium Darmstadt (Germany) approval F107/117 and IMI17 by Regierungspr채sidium T체bingen).
